Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 147th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 5/1/2015, off Takamasa Tokuhei (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/2015, off Takamasa Tokuhei (MON)...
Hit for the cycle against Colorado on 8/28/2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $775,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,135,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2017, hitting .452 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 7 runs against Montreal on 5/1/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,685,714 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/10/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2020, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
9/1/2020: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $11,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Was claimed off waivers by Boston on 8/10/2022.
Traded from Boston to Cincinnati on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Michael Ramirez, LF Maximo Obrien. Going to BOS: CF Craig Parkhill, P Greg Dunkley)...
